posts.descriptionHtml:
On Sunday, I had an opportunity to share my knowledge about startup funding for the startup school First EXIP. Thank you Nataliia Riazanova for the invitation. I hope it was a great time for all the students. Also, thank you Yaroslav Azhnyuk for your advice.

I upload my presentation (with small changes). It is mainly in Russian. I hope founders will receive the basic understanding of the investment terms.

https: //www.slideshare.net/IvanCh‚Ä¶/startup-funding-82418117‚Ä¶

P.s. Lawyers are not dinosaurs:)

posts.topic: Hot legal aspects of drones in Ukraine

My article about drones in Ukraine. Some legal overview.

comments.comment: Pretty nice article, thank you, Vanya! In addition, there are a lot of problems with drones in IHL, IHRL, that represent mirrorLY in ATO in Ukraine like how automated system, which are popular in UAVs, follow this international rules, who are responsible for targeting killing etc.
